rows.label: qev011503_MSG0034
rows.name:
I need iron blades and some combat bodywear.
Got it? Good! Now go get it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0035
rows.name:
And put a rush on that, if you can. My fever for
adventure is about to hit CRITICAL MASS![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0036
rows.name:
Hey, welcome back. You just missed my
best friend in the world, Walter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0037
rows.name:
You'd be proud. I got another big lecture about giving
up on becoming a BLADE operative, and I just shut up,
smiled real big, and listened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0038
rows.name:
Why bother arguing when I'm about to leave the nest?
That is, assuming you got the equipment I asked for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0039
rows.name:
First up, a weapon fit to cleave a millesaur in twain...
the iron blades![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0050
rows.name: AWESOME.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0049
rows.name:
Next, protective gear able to stop a charging suid in
its tracks...combat bodywear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0040
rows.name:
BEST. PRESENT. EVER!
With these bad boys, I can handle anything
the indigens of Mira can dish out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0041
rows.name:
Thank you SO much, um... Wait, do I still not know
your name? Wow, embarrassing! ...So what is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_JNK0070
rows.name: Answer

rows.label: qev011503_SEL0071
rows.name: State your name.

rows.label: qev011503_JNK0080
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: qev011503_SEL0081
rows.name: Decline to answer.

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0042
rows.name: Hey, cool. Strong name. I like it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0043
rows.name:
But I'm terrible with names, so from today forth,
I'm calling you Chief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0044
rows.name:
That's...weirdly mysterious? But okay.
Looks like someone needs a nickname![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0045
rows.name:
From now on, you're "Chief"!
...And no, you don't get a say in this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0046
rows.name: All right! Now that I'm all geared up, I'm off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0047
rows.name:
I'll put those other BLADEs to shame and have Walter
eating his words by the end of the week![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011503_MSG0048
rows.name:
Thanks for everything, Chief.
Catch you on the outside, yeah?[ST:wait ]
